page.title: 14Kelso Civic Week
page.content: Lots of things happen during Kelso Civic Week; the{Funfair}comes,the {Kelso Laddie}is picked,there is always a{raft race}and lots of other events. The raft race is probably the event which gains the most public attention. Another is the{fancy dress {parade}when lorries are decorated and people dress up, singing and dancing and just being silly. The thing young people enjoy most is the{fair.}There is a good choice of shows like the Big Wheel, the Speedway, Waltzers, roundabouts for little ones and lots more. One of the other events is the {Yetholm Ride}when the Kelso Laddie and about 200 others ride 7 miles to the village of Yetholm. Many of them usually get drunk there!. The Yetholm Ride is a reminder of the times when people in Scotland used to raid the north of England and steal cattle.
